com.facebook.react.views.image

类 ReactImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • GenericDraweeView
      • com.facebook.react.views.image.ReactImageView

  • public class ReactImageView
extends GenericDraweeView
    Wrapper class around Fresco's GenericDraweeView, enabling persisting props across multiple view update and consistent processing of both static and network images.

    • 字段概要
